summary.span: 將字串編碼，以用於 HTML、XML、CSS 及 URL 字串。

span.span: Encodes a string for use in HTML, XML, CSS, and URL strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別來覆寫類別，用來編碼和解碼類別方法中的字串，例如預設， ，和。You can use the class to override the class that is used by default to encode and decode strings in methods of classes such as , , and . 在 類別，安全清單中找不到的所有字元都會都編碼所和方法。In the class, all characters that are not found in the safe list are encoded by the and methods. 若要取代類別類別中，使用登錄它`encoderType`httpRuntime 項目，在 Web.config 檔案中，如下列範例所示的屬性：To replace the class with the class, register it using the `encoderType` attribute of the httpRuntime element in the Web.config file, as shown in following example: ``` ``` 如需不同的編碼方法的預設安全字元清單可以找到中的 < 備註 > ， ， ，和方法。A list of default safe characters for different encoding methods can be found in the remarks for the , , , and methods. 使用也可以修改預設的安全清單方法。The default safe list can be modified by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將不安全的清單中的所有字元都編碼。This method encodes all characters except those that are in the safe list. > [!NOTE] > 加上引號 ("") 括住產生的字串之前將它新增至階層式樣式表。Put quotation marks (" ") around the resulting string before you add it to a cascading style sheet. 下表列出預設安全的字元。The following table lists the default safe characters. 所有都是從[Unicode C0 控制項和基本拉丁文](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)字元範圍。All are from the [Unicode C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf) character range. |字元Character(s)|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |A-ZA-Z|大寫的字母字元Uppercase alphabetic characters| |a-za-z|小寫字母的字元Lowercase alphabetic characters| |0-90-9|編號Numbers| 下表列出範例輸入，以及對應編碼的輸出。The following table lists examples of inputs and the corresponding encoded outputs. ||| |-|-| |`alert('XSS Attack!');`|`alert\000028\000027XSS\000020Attack\000021\000027\000029\00003B`| |`user@contoso.com`|`user\000040contoso\00002Ecom`| |`Anti-Cross Site Scripting Namespace`|`Anti\00002DCross\000020Site\000020Scripting\000020Namespace`| CSS 字元逸出序列所組成的反斜線字元 (\\) 後面最多六個十六進位數字，代表從 ISO 10646 標準的字元碼。The CSS character escape sequence consists of a backslash character (\\) followed by up to six hexadecimal digits that represent a character code from the ISO 10646 standard. （會有效等同於 Unicode 標準 ISO 10646）。十六進位數字以外的任何字元是逸出序列的結尾。(The ISO 10646 standard is effectively equivalent to Unicode.) Any character other than a hexadecimal digit terminates the escape sequence. 如果遵循逸出序列的字元也是有效的十六進位數字，它必須逸出序列中包含六個位數，或使用空格字元來終止逸出序列。If a character that follows the escape sequence is also a valid hexadecimal digit, it must either include six digits in the escape sequence or use a white-space character to terminate the escape sequence. 比方說，`\000020`代表空間。For example, `\000020` denotes a space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將不安全的清單中的所有字元都編碼。This method encodes all characters except those that are in the safe list. 字元都會編碼使用`&#DECIMAL;`標記法。Characters are encoded by using `&#DECIMAL;` notation. > [!NOTE] > 雙引號 ("") 或單一引號 (' ') 括住產生的字串之前將它新增至頁面。Put double quotation marks (" ") or single quotation marks (' ') around the resulting string before you add it to a page. 下表列出預設安全的字元。The following table lists the default safe characters. 所有已從 Unicode [C0 控制項和基本拉丁文](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)字元範圍，除非另有說明，在 [描述] 欄中。All are from the Unicode [C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf) character range unless noted in the Description column. |字元Character(s)|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |A-ZA-Z|大寫英文字母字元Uppercase Latin alphabetic characters| ||a-za-z|小寫英文字母字元Lowercase Latin alphabetic characters| |0-90-9|編號Numbers| |!!|驚嘆號Exclamation mark| |#|數字的符號，雜湊Number sign, hash| |$|貨幣符號Dollar sign| |%|百分比符號Percent sign| |( )( )|括號Parentheses| |*|星號Asterisk| |+|加號Plus sign| |,,|逗號Comma| |-|連字號、 減號Hyphen, minus| |。.|期間，點，完全停止Period, dot, full stop| |/|斜線Slash| |::|冒號Colon| |;;|分號Semicolon| |=|等號Equals sign| |??|問號Question mark| |@|商業 at 記號Commercial at-sign| |[ ][ ]|方括號Square brackets| |\\|反斜線Backslash| |^|插入號Caret| |__|底線Underscore| |\`|抑音符號\`|Grave accent| |{ }{ }|大括號、 大括號Braces, curly brackets| ||||垂直線Vertical line| |~|波狀符號Tilde| |0x00A1 - 0x00AC0x00A1 - 0x00AC|0x00A1 (161 十進位) 和從 Unicode 0x00AC (172 十進位) 之間的特殊字元[C1 控制項和拉丁文 1 補充](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0080.pdf)字元範圍。Special characters between 0x00A1 (161 decimal) and 0x00AC (172 decimal) from the Unicode [C1 Controls and Latin-1 Supplement](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0080.pdf) character range.| |0x00AE-0x00FF0x00AE - 0x017F0x0100 - 0x017F|0x0100 (256 十進位) 和 0x017F (383 十進位) 之間的字元。Characters between 0x0100 (256 decimal) and 0x017F (383 decimal). (Unicode[拉丁文擴充-A](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0100.pdf)字元範圍。)(The Unicode [Latin-Extended-A](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0100.pdf) character range.)| |0x0180 - 0x024F0x0180 - 0x024F|0x0180 (384 十進位) 和 0x024F (小數點 591) 之間的字元。Characters between 0x0180 (384 decimal) and 0x024F (591 decimal). (Unicode[拉丁文擴充-B](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0180.pdf)字元範圍。)(The Unicode [Latin-Extended-B](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0180.pdf) character range.)| |0x0250 - 0x02AF0x0250 - 0x02AF|0x0250 (十進位 592) 和 0x02AF (十進位 687) 之間的字元。Characters between 0x0250 (592 decimal) and 0x02AF (687 decimal). (Unicode[國際音標擴充](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0250.pdf)字元範圍。)(The Unicode [IPA Extensions](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0250.pdf) character range.)| |0x02B0 - 0x02FF0x02B0 - 0x02FF|0x02B0 (688 十進位) 和 0x02FF (十進位 767) 之間的字元。Characters between 0x02B0 (688 decimal) and 0x02FF (767 decimal). (Unicode[間隔修飾字元](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U02B0.pdf)字元範圍。)(The Unicode [Spacing Modifier Letters](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U02B0.pdf) character range.)| |0x0300 - 0x036F0x0300 - 0x036F|0x0300 (768 十進位) 和 0x036F (十進位 879) 之間的字元。Characters between 0x0300 (768 decimal) and 0x036F (879 decimal). (Unicode[組合變音符號標記](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0300.pdf)字元範圍。)(The Unicode [Combining Diacritical Marks](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0300.pdf) character range.)| 下表列出範例輸入，以及對應編碼的輸出。The following table lists examples of inputs and the corresponding encoded outputs. ||| |-|-| |`alert('XSS Attack!');`|`alert('XSS Attack!');`| |``|`<script>alert('XSS Attack!');</script>`| |`alert('XSSあAttack!');`|`alert('XSSあAttack!');`| |`user@contoso.com`|`user@contoso.com`| |`"Anti-Cross Site Scripting Namespace"`|`"Anti-Cross Site Scripting Namespace"`| 若要自訂安全清單，請呼叫方法。To customize the safe list, call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將不安全的清單中的所有字元都編碼。This method encodes all characters except those that are in the safe list. 字元都會編碼使用`%SINGLE_BYTE_HEX`標記法。Characters are encoded by using `%SINGLE_BYTE_HEX` notation. > [!NOTE] > 雙引號 ("") 或單一引號 (' ') 括住產生的字串之前將它新增至頁面。Put double quotation marks (" ") or single quotation marks (' ') around the resulting string before you add it to a page. 下表列出預設安全的字元。The following table lists the default safe characters. 所有字元都是從 Unicode [C0 控制項和基本拉丁文](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)字元範圍。All characters are from the Unicode [C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf) character range. |Unicode 程式碼圖表Unicode code chart|字元Character(s)|描述Description| |------------------------|--------------------|-----------------| |A-ZA-Z|大寫的字母字元Uppercase alphabetic characters| |a-za-z|小寫字母的字元Lowercase alphabetic characters| |0-90-9|編號Numbers| |-|連字號、 減號Hyphen, minus| |。.|期間，點，完全停止Period, dot, full stop| |__|底線Underscore| |~|波狀符號Tilde| 下表列出範例輸入，以及對應編碼的輸出。The following table lists examples of inputs and the corresponding encoded outputs. ||| |-|-| |`alert('XSS Attack!');`|`alert%28%27XSS+Attack%21%27%29%3b`| |``|`%3cscript%3ealert%28%27XSS+Attack%21%27%29%3b%3c%2fscript%3e`| |`alert('XSSあAttack!');`|`alert%28%27XSS%e3%81%82Attack%21%27%29%3b`| |`user@contoso.com`|`user@contoso.com`| |`Anti-Cross Site Scripting Namespace`|`Anti-Cross+Site+Scripting+Namespace`|

span.span: Marks characters from the specified Unicode code charts as safe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全清單會影響所有 HTML XML、 CSS 和 URL 編碼的方法。The safe list affects all HTML XML, CSS, and URL encoding methods. 但有些例外狀況，Unicode 字碼圖表未直接對應到書寫語言。With some exceptions, Unicode code charts do not directly correspond to written languages. 若要新增支援特定語言或語言組通常需要將多個程式碼圖表標示為安全。To add support for a specific language or set of languages often requires marking multiple code charts as safe. 若要新增日文語言的支援，同時允許英文繼續，請使用下列語法：To add support for the Japanese language while continuing to allow English, use the following syntax: ``` MarkAsSafe( LowerCodeCharts.Default, LowerMidCodeCharts.HangulJamo, MidCodeCharts.None, UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkRadicalsSupplement | UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkSymbolsAndPunctuation | UpperMidCodeCharts.Hiragana | UpperMidCodeCharts.Katakana | UpperMidCodeCharts.KatakanaPhoneticExtensions | UpperMidCodeCharts.LatinExtendedD | UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkUnifiedIdeographs, UpperCodeCharts.None); ``` > [!NOTE] > 必須呼叫方法`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的方法。The method must be called in the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file.

exception.span: 在 Global.asax 檔中，會在 方法外部呼叫 方法。

span.span: The method was called outside the method in the Global.asax file.

`%SINGLE_BYTE_HEX` notation. 下表列出預設安全的字元。The following table lists the default safe characters. 所有字元都是從 Unicode [C0 控制項和基本拉丁文](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)字元範圍。All characters are from the Unicode [C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf) character range. |字元Character(s)|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |A-ZA-Z|大寫的字母字元Uppercase alphabetic characters| |a-za-z|小寫字母的字元Lowercase alphabetic characters| |0-90-9|編號Numbers| |#|數字的符號，雜湊Number sign, hash| |%|百分比符號Percent sign| |( )( )|括號Parentheses| |-|連字號、 減號Hyphen, minus| |。.|期間，點，完全停止Period, dot, full stop| |/|斜線Slash| |\\|反斜線Backslash| |__|底線Underscore| |{ }{ }|大括號、 大括號Braces, curly brackets| ||||垂直線Vertical line| |~|波狀符號Tilde| 下表列出範例輸入，以及對應編碼的輸出。The following table lists examples of inputs and the corresponding encoded outputs. ||| |-|-| |`http://www.contoso.com:8080//[page].htm?v={value1}#x=[amount]`|`http://www.contoso.com:8080/%3cen-us%3e/%5bpage%5d.htm?v={value1}#x=[amount]`| |`alert('XSS Attack!');`|`alert(%27XSS%20Attack%21%27)%3b`| |``|`%3cscript%3ealert(%27XSS%20Attack%21%27)%3b%3c/script%3e`| |`alert('XSSあAttack!');`|`alert(%27XSS%e3%81%82Attack%21%27)%3b`| |`user@contoso.com`|`user%40contoso.com`| |`"Anti-Cross Site Scripting Namespace"`|`%22Anti-Cross%20Site%20Scripting%20Namespace%22`| 這個方法會將編碼 URL 的路徑。This method encodes only the path of a URL. 這個方法不會編碼配置 (例如`http:`， `ftp:`，或`file:`)，將授權單位 (比方說，`www.northwind.com`或`www.contoso.com:8080`)，查詢或片段 (比方說， `?v=s978dfs9#x=103`)。This method will not encode the scheme (for example, `http:`, `ftp:`, or `file:`), the authority (for example, `www.northwind.com` or `www.contoso.com:8080`), or the query or fragment (for example, `?v=s978dfs9#x=103`). 如果沒有任何配置或字串中的授權單位，為相對路徑，會假設字串是，而且路徑會編碼。If there is no scheme or authority in the string, the string is assumed to be a relative path, and the path is encoded. 在下列 URL 中，子字串`/default.htm`編碼：In the following URL, only the substring `/default.htm` is encoded: `http://www.contoso.com:8080/default.htm?v=s978dfs9#x=103`
